title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: LINK Gains 4.6% as Index Inches Higher From Thursday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Ethereum (ETH) joined Chainlink (LINK) as a top performer, gaining 3.2%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3868.63, up 0.4% (+16.75) since yesterday's close.

Fifteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: LINK (+4.6%) and ETH (+3.2%).

Laggards: XLM (-3.2%) and XRP (-0.9%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is up 0.4% with 15 of 20 assets trading higher, led by significant gains in LINK (+4.6%) and ETH (+3.2%).
